TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AmbientTheme extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 为设计时环境中的顶级工作流提供外观属性设置。

span.span: Provides the look and feel property settings to a top-level workflow in a design-time environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流主题定义工作流设计图面的外观。Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface. 这包括为工作流设计图面定义的任何背景样式、前景样式、字体以及图标。This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface. 环境主题包含工作流设计图面的默认显示属性。An ambient theme contains the default display properties for the workflow design surface. 它提供用于整个设计图面的设置（例如网格、背景和前景颜色、只读设计器颜色等）。It provides settings to be used across the entire design surface (for example, the grid, background and foreground colors, read-only designer color, and so on). 它可以使用用户选择的值或来自操作系统的值。It can use either user-selected values or the values from the operational system.

summary.span: 获取或设置工作流设计图面上的环境背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the ambient back color on a workflow design surface.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示环境背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the ambient background color.

value.span: 默认值为白色。

span.span: The default is white.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置 属性时，它对 属性值求反。When you set the property, it negates the property value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一种可从派生自 类的类访问 属性的通用方法。The following code example demonstrates a common way you can access the property from a class that derives from the class. 此代码示例摘自 DatabaseService.cs 文件中的“工作流监控”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DatabaseService.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [工作流监视器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定从 类继承的类的环境主题属性的来源。 specifies the source of ambient theme properties for classes that inherit from the class. 两个可能的来源是操作系统和设计器指定的设置。The two possible sources are the operating system and the designer-specified settings.

summary.span: 获取用于填充与工作流设计图面上显示的只读项关联的图形形状的环境画笔。

span.span: Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with read-only items displayed on the workflow design surface.

value.span: 一个 ，表示与设计图面上工作流上只读项关联的画笔。

span.span: A that represents the brush associated with read-only items on the workflow on a design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性包含一个空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`），则默认情况下它将返回一个其颜色设置为当前 属性值的 对象。If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a object with its color set to the current property value.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作流设计图面是否显示配置错误。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow design surface displays configuration errors.

value.span: 如果工作流设计图面显示配置错误，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the workflow design surface is to display configuration errors; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 设置为 false。The following code example demonstrates how you can set to false. 对工作流设计图面执行此项操作意味着设计图面上显示的任何 对象将不显示它们的关联 对象。Doing this for a workflow design surface means that none of the objects displayed on the design surface will display their associated objects. 此代码示例摘自 WorkflowDesignerControl.cs 文件中的跟踪配置文件设计器 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Tracking Profile Designer SDK Sample from the WorkflowDesignerControl.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [跟踪配置文件设计器示例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742004(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms742004(v=vs.90)). summary.span: 获取或设置要在工作流设计图面上显示的文本质量。

span.span: Gets or sets the text quality to display on the workflow design surface.

value.span: 一个 ，指定要在工作流设计图面上使用的文本质量。

span.span: A that specifies the text quality settings to use on the workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可以确定在工作流设计图面及其所有子设计器上显示的文本是消除锯齿还是带锯齿的。 allows you to determine whether the text displayed on a workflow design surface, and all its child designers, is anti-aliased or aliased. 消除锯齿的文本提供较高质量的文本显示，而带锯齿的文本需要占用的资源较少。Anti-aliased text provides higher quality text display, while aliased text requires fewer resources to maintain.

summary.span: 获取或设置工作流设计图面上要作为水印显示的图像的环境路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含工作流设计图面上要作为水印显示的图像的环境路径。

span.span: A string that contains the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可以将一个图像关联为工作流设计图面的水印。Use to associate an image as a watermark image for a workflow design surface. 在设置 时，如果 `null` 不为 `Nothing`（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则 将释放由 占用的任何资源，并将其设置为 `null` (`Nothing`)。If is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when you set , disposes of any resources used by and sets its value to `null` (`Nothing`).
